content.html: When advertisers chose to boycott GB News, the Daily Mail claimed this was "the slow painful death of free speech". When people boycott @HalifaxBank over its inclusive staffing policies the Mail has no such objection...
content.value:
When advertisers chose to boycott GB News, the Daily Mail claimed this was "the slow painful death of free speech". 

When people boycott @HalifaxBank over its inclusive staffing policies the Mail has no such objection...

photo.alt: Daily Mail headline 1: "MICK HUME: As corporate giants meekly submit to woke minority over a new TV station... this is the slow painful death of free speech" Daily Mail headline 2: "Exodus from the Halifax over bank's woke badges amid outcry after its decision to urge staff to share their pronouns More than 150 social media users say they are boycotting Halifax after the post They posted a badge which read 'she/her/hers' and added: 'Pronouns matter' 'You're welcome to close your account,' said the bank's social media manager A Tory councillor said it was 'astonishing' the bank behaves 'like a trans activist'"
